h2_title: Buddha's Right Hand Boss Fight and Guide
content: If you're quick, you can dash under it before it starts spewing poison to get around behind it. If not, quickly get up onto a Pillar Stance to perch above the poison.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Buddha's_Right_Hand.md', within the main section titled 'Buddha's Right Hand', specifically from the subsection 'Buddha's Right Hand Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
If you're quick, you can dash under it before it starts spewing poison to get around behind it. If not, quickly get up onto a Pillar Stance to perch above the poison.
